name: The Tops cashier

topics.response_text: Welcome to The Tops. How can I help you?

topics.topic_text: [PRESS DEMO] Enough gambling, more fighting. Take me to the no man's land near Camp Forlorn Hope.
topics.response_text: You'll need someone to watch your back - Craig Boone, an NCR sniper, will be joining you. Keep your head down out there!

topics.topic_text: I'd like to exchange caps for chips.
topics.response_text: How many chips would you like?
Here's your chip. Is there anything else I can help you with?

topics.topic_text: 100 chips for 1 Legion Aureus or 25 Legion Denarii.
topics.response_text: Here's your chips. Is there anything else I can help you with?
Here's your chips. Is there anything else I can help you with?

topics.topic_text: I'd like to exchange NCR money for chips.
topics.response_text: How many chips would you like?

topics.topic_text: I'd like to turn in my chips.
topics.response_text: In what currency would you like your payout? Non-caps currencies will have fractions paid out in caps.
Here's your chips. Is there anything else I can help you with?
Here's your chips. Is there anything else I can help you with?
Here's your chips. Is there anything else I can help you with?

topics.topic_text: I'll take my payout in caps.
topics.response_text: Caps it is. Will there be anything else?
Here's your NCR money. Will there be anything else?
Very well. Will there be anything else?
Enjoy your stay at The Tops.

conversation.response_text: Thank you, and enjoy your stay at The Tops.

description:
Tops Casino Cashier is a 35 year-old Caucasian Female.

A middle-aged woman with a tired but professional appearance, working behind the cashier counter at The Tops casino. She has short, practical hair and wears the standard casino staff uniform.

Tops Casino Cashier's Personality: Pragmatic and no-nonsense, with a terse, business-like demeanor. She's seen it all at The Tops and isn't easily impressed or intimidated. While not unfriendly, she prefers to keep interactions brief and transactional.

Tops Casino Cashier's Backstory: Born and raised in New Vegas, she's spent most of her life working in the city's service industry. She started as a cocktail waitress at The Tops before being promoted to cashier position five years ago. She's developed a thick skin dealing with gamblers and maintains a professional distance from her work. She lives in a small apartment in Freeside and sends most of her caps back to her younger sister who's still living with their elderly mother in Westside.
